messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph:  Late afternoon saw Det. Torres, Det. Daniels, and Det. Fisher rush to a secluded hamlet. Offs. West, McCoy, and Duncan offered backup from afar. Patrol Off. Armstrong scouted the surroundings on his bike. Sgt. Palmer communicated with the hamlet's local police, and Lt. Hansen addressed the media. Capt. Kennedy orchestrated the mission. Inside the portable unit, Tech. Perry and Crim. Wood were engrossed, and Dr. Foster scrutinized what they unearthed.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
